text: "Vampire" (spelled in all small lettters) is a song by American singer- songwriter Olivia Rodrigo. Geffen Records released it on June 30, 2023, as the first song from her future second studio album, Guts (2023). Rodrigo co-wrote the song with its producer Dan Nigro. A music video for the song directed by Petra Collins was released on June 30 as well. == References == Category:2023 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Olivia Rodrigo songs
title: Vampire (Olivia Rodrigo song)
